title: Smart Thinkers!
author: verias
text:
Theresa seems to have a pretty solid handle on the plan, doesn't she?

In other news, the MotA Patreon is still holding steady at $270. J's got some things in the works behind the scenes, so we'll see what happens!


Regards,
Keith W.

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text: Heh, Chrys is not gonna be happy about that plan.
